title: Vintage Rose Cut Diamond and Tourmaline Leaf Pendant with South Sea Pearl
materials: Pink Tourmaline Beads. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This unique pendant features a captivating arrangement of rose-cut diamonds surrounding a meticulously carved green tourmaline leaf. The open setting of the diamonds allows maximum light reflection, highlighting their brilliance. A lustrous South Sea pearl dangles gracefully, complemented by petite pink tourmaline beads. The leaf design provides a botanical element to add a touch of nature. The piece also showcases delicate milgrain detailing.
occasions: or adding a touch of elegance to everyday wear. Makes a stunning statement piece for contemporary weddings or engagement parties. Ideal for cocktail events.
description: This one-of-a-kind pendant blends the timeless appeal of rose-cut diamonds with the natural beauty of a carved tourmaline leaf. The meticulous craftsmanship, high-quality materials, and unique design make it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. This piece has a unique aesthetic that will grab the attention of many. It's a wearable art that makes a unique statement.
